alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 1:47AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton, central Merrick and central Polk Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 146 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Duncan to near Clarks to near Marquette. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Isolated instances of slightly larger hail to around penny size are possible, but this will not occur along the entire line. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Silver Creek, Polk, Marquette and Hordville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
